instructions:
Character sheet for Warlock! OSR by Fire Ruby Designs.
Thank you [FRD](https://firerubydesigns.co.uk/home) for permission to use limited content from the rulebook to improve the sheet.
Credit to [RPG-Awesome](https://nagoshiashumari.github.io/Rpg-Awesome/) for SVG icons used on the sheet.
Check the HELP tab on the Sheet or check the [readme](https://github.com/roll20/roll20-character-sheets/WarlockOSR/readme.md) for instructions

useroptions.description: When attacking or casting a spell, use the Reactive Roll system to guide the rest of the combat exchange.
